posts.contents:
## Overview
 
 This document gives a way to make a frontend web application nwith Vue.The steps below are exactly same as " inspired_by " 
 blog.
 
 ## Create a vue project with vue - cli
 
 > For information on how to use Vue CLI 3, visit[official ndocumentation](https: //cli.vuejs.org/guide/)
 
 -What I chose:
 
 ## Install vuetify
 
 - They say:
 
 > Vuetify is a Vue UI Library with beautifully handcrafted nMaterial Components.No design skills required— everything you nneed to create amazing applications is at your fingertips.

topics.name: Philosophy
topics.coverDescription: “Is man merely a mistake of God's? Or God merely a mistake of man's?” – Friedrich Nietzsche
